overview:
As an accomplished lawyer with eight years of legal experience, Robyn brings extensive expertise in the areas of contract, corporate, employment, entertainment and intellectual property law, as well as defense of small and large corporate clients in complex litigation. Robyn is a graduate of the University of Massachusetts, Boston, and Suffolk University Law School.

A sport enthusiast for years, Robyn has been horseback riding since childhood and continues to enjoy equestrian activities as an adult. She also played youth softball, basketball and soccer, playing softball through high school. In college, Robyn studied nutrition and fitness and began weight training, an activity she continues today several times per week. Robyn also enjoys biking, running and swimming.
